        public RegisteredUser loginUser(java.lang.String id,
                                java.lang.String pswrd)
                         throws LoggedException,
                                BannedUserException
        User login. If a host has a wrong credit card, it shows a message telling it
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the user
        pswrd - Password of the user
        Returns:
        User if it exist or null if it don't
        Throws:
        LoggedException - Another user is logged
        BannedUserException - The user is banned

      • addUser

        public boolean addUser(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String surename,
                       java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String creditCard,
                       boolean guest,
                       boolean host)
        Creates a new user
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user
        surename - Surename of the user
        id - Id of the user
        password - Password of the user
        creditCard - Credit card of the user
        guest - The user is a guest
        host - The user is a host
        Returns:
        true if everything went ok false if the id exist or both guest and host are fasle
